column5: there was an accident on the Phnom Penh-Kampot Railway line
column8: Pur Senchey District.------A car was crossing when a locomotive hit it and dragged it for more than 10 meters
column10: there was no danger to the occupants
column11: and the locomotives was unaffected .------The vehicle above the white white RX-300
column13: was driven by an unidentified man. He said the accident occurred because he did not see the train and heard no warning.------The owner of the car did not ask for compensation
column14: but another train was delayed. ------Arey News
